name: Midnight Tales VOL.1
description:
Midnight Tales VOL.1 is a horror game set in the 80's and 90's with PS1 style graphics. Inspired by the famous "Tales From The Crypt" they bring the games of the series a unique experience with four little horrors. In addition, a story mode that frames the four games in another even more macabre reality.

Welcome to a true VHS tape era cult horror experience.

STORY MODE:

Rachel works at a VHS tape store at night when she decides to watch a movie that follows a series of bizarre events and the resurgence of a cult known as "The Shining".

Thus bringing a total immersion experience, connecting everything in one.

FOUR GAMES:

- Just Arrived

- Shotgun Massacre

- Pizza Delivery

- The Last Enlightned

CHARACTERISTICS:

Gameplay: First person.

Camera Style: VHS, 1995, Distorted, Pixelate.

Graphics: PS1/PS2 style with low polish.

Story: Full story with four games, story mode is most recommended.

Soundtrack: The game's music seeks to create an even greater immersion for the player to feel in the 80s.

NOTE:

The aim of the game is to convey a sense of true cult horror from the 80s and 90s, an over-the-top horror that sometimes has its touch of humor and extreme weirdness.
